Class MenuFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileIO<MenuItem>
      • MenuFileIO

  • public class MenuFileIO
extends FileIO<MenuItem>
    MenuFileIO handles input and output of data into MenuList.txt
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuFileIO() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void export(MenuItem m, java.io.PrintWriter fout)
      This method will export one MenuItem object to a MenuList.txt.
      void exportAll(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> list)
      This method exports every MenuItem object stored in the list to MenuList.txt.
      void parseList(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> list)
      This method reads in from MenuList.txt and add each MenuItem object into list.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuFileIO

        public MenuFileIO()

    • Method Detail

      • parseList

        public void parseList(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> list)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method reads in from MenuList.txt and add each MenuItem object into list.
        Parameters:
        list - An Array List which holds all the details from MenuList.txt.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • export

        public void export(MenuItem m,
                   java.io.PrintWriter fout)
        This method will export one MenuItem object to a MenuList.txt.
        Parameters:
        m - The MenuItem object that is going to be exported.
        fout - A PrintWriter object.

      • exportAll

        public void exportAll(java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> list)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method exports every MenuItem object stored in the list to MenuList.txt. It calls the export function repeatedly until it reaches the end of list.
        Parameters:
        list - This ArrayList contains all the new updates made from the user and the existing ones.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
